body_html:
Ah thanks! I specifically checked out 1.8rc1 before, but it works with master.

With some tweaks to the build script (related to CUDA library paths) I managed to compile TF against the CUDA 9.1 package that comes with Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.

body:
Ah thanks! I specifically checked out 1.8rc1 before, but it works with master.

With some tweaks to the build script (related to CUDA library paths) I managed to compile TF against the CUDA 9.1 package that comes with Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.
